data.message: The messenger update is horrible. If I wanted to use Snapchat, I would download the app and use it. I understand that some people may find the feature useful but I would love for the messenger app to be simplified. The interface is so cluttered now. It would be awesome if you gave users the option to disable it.

replies.message: Thanks for sharing your feedback, Shatera. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone. Let us know what would make Facebook more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2qLcFvc. -Jessica
